text: include: z light and general industry (use Classes E(g)(iii) and B2); z storage and logistics/distribution (use Class B8); z secondary materials, waste management and aggregates (use Classes B2, B8 and Sui Generis); z utilities infrastructure (such as energy and water); z land for sustainable transport functions including intermodal freight interchanges, rail, and bus infrastructure; z wholesale markets; z emerging industrial-related sectors; z flexible hybrid space to accommodate services that support the wider economy and population; z Low-cost industrial and related space for micro, small and medium sized enterprises; and z research and development of industrial and related products or processes.
